name: Cyclopsolot
description:
Taking control of our hero LeftY, can you help Arthur Pear find the other Arthur Pear?

Use all of your awareness to try and complete the adventure within the time limit! Pay attention to the small details and use your real life gaming sense to ultimately speed your way through to victory.

25 mins is more than enough.. or is it?

Good Luck o/

Note: please apply browser zoom for user preference if you want more from the fullscreen!
